name: ContentDocument
description: Represents a document that has been uploaded to a library in Salesforce CRM Content or Salesforce Files.
summary:
The `ContentDocument` object in Salesforce represents a document or file stored in the system, encapsulating various attributes to manage and track the document's lifecycle and properties. Here's a summary of its attributes:

1. **Id (`id`)**: Unique identifier for the document.
2. **CreatedById (`reference`)**: Reference to the user who created the document.
3. **CreatedDate (`datetime`)**: Timestamp when the document was created.
4. **LastModifiedById (`reference`)**: Reference to the user who last modified the document.
5. **LastModifiedDate (`datetime`)**: Timestamp when the document was last modified.
6. **IsArchived (`boolean`)**: Indicates if the document is archived.
7. **ArchivedById (`reference`)**: Reference to the user who archived the document.
8. **ArchivedDate (`date`)**: Date when the document was archived.
9. **IsDeleted (`boolean`)**: Indicates if the document is deleted.
10. **OwnerId (`reference`)**: Reference to the owner of the document.
11. **SystemModstamp (`datetime`)**: System-generated timestamp for the last update.
12. **Title (`string`)**: Title of the document.
13. **PublishStatus (`picklist`)**: Status of the document's publication (e.g., Draft, Published).
14. **LatestPublishedVersionId (`reference`)**: Reference to the latest published version of the document.
15. **ParentId (`reference`)**: Reference to the parent object (if any).
16. **LastViewedDate (`datetime`)**: Timestamp when the document was last viewed.
17. **LastReferencedDate (`datetime`)**: Timestamp when the document was last referenced.
18. **Description (`textarea`)**: Description of the document.
19. **ContentSize (`int`)**: Size of the document content in bytes.
20. **FileType (`string`)**: Type of the file (e.g., PDF, DOCX).
21. **FileExtension (`string`)**: Extension of the file (e.g., .pdf, .docx).
22. **SharingOption (`picklist`)**: Options for sharing the document.
23. **SharingPrivacy (`picklist`)**: Privacy level of the document sharing.
24. **ContentModifiedDate (`datetime`)**: Timestamp when the content was last modified.
25. **ContentAssetId (`reference`)**: Reference to the related content asset.

Overall, the `ContentDocument` object is pivotal for managing files within Salesforce, providing comprehensive metadata to track creation, modification, ownership, and sharing attributes.
label: Content Document
